rule: If the word cannot be tagged with any of the listed part-of-speech tags, the output must be exactly the word "Unknown" without any additional characters or information.
complianceText:
The task requires that only the part of speech tag should be returned as the output. The given output "CC: Depicting" contains both the tag ("CC") and an additional word "Depicting". According to the task description, only "CC" should have been returned without any additional text. Therefore, the output does not adhere to the requirement of returning only the part of speech tag.

ERR
